thread.title: 1 arrested in Facebook threats against school
thread.title_full: 1 arrested in Facebook threats against school | www.kirotv.com

author: kirotv.com
title: 1 arrested in Facebook threats against school
text:
Police made an arrest after a threat was posted about a Port Orchard junior high school Wednesday night.
A message sent to parents by schools superintendent Michelle Reid said someone contacted the Kitsap County Sheriff's Office late Wednesday to report disturbing Facebook posts about the possibility of a school threat situation at Marcus Whitman Junior High in the future.
The superintendent said the threats were investigated by officers and the young person responsible for the posts was arrested and taken into custody.
